name: 3 Trumpets - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus 3 Trumpets ensemble. Bright, brilliant tone with piercing projection. Ideal for heroic fanfares, powerful melodic lines, and cinematic brass sections.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with legato - add an articulation change entry, switching to staccatissimo - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained/legato, then back to staccatissimo. Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Ensemble trumpets (3 players). CC1 controls dynamics for legato and sustained. Use velocity for staccatissimo.
